property.name: text
property.value:
This model, from [1], combines simple continuous-time models of two wheels and brake pedal with discrete-event models of two wheel controllers and one brake controller that interact over a bus. The brake controllers include a slippage detector that compares the average wheel rotation against each wheel rotation and, when the difference exceeds a threshold, disables braking. This is a form of anti-lock braking.
[1] Iman Jahandideh, Fatemeh Ghassemi, Marjan Sirjani, Hybrid Rebeca: Modeling and Analyzing of Cyber-Physical Systems, CyPhy 2018.

property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Marjan Sirjani and Edward A. Lee
